td.content: s:a female aged 46 ys presents with critical night blindness and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. These symptoms are present for about 10 days. she denies smoking Patient is a moderate drinker o:Height 64 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Full-Field Electroretinogram Non-recordable (extinguished) ERG, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Full-Field Electroretinogram, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

, Full - Field Electroretinogram Non - recordable (extinguished) ERG , Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on

td.content: s:patient describes Body Aches. pt is a female watchmaker aged 46 years. Denies ever using tobacco she drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 64 in, Weight 101 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered ESR.

s:a 46 YO white f presents with 2 years history of critical night blindness. o:Height 65 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 18, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:pt presents with 17 months history of critical night blindness. patient also reports increased frequency of Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. pt is a female aged 46 ys. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in her past denies any smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 102 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 16, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Full-Field Electroretinogram.

s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of Body Aches. patient is a f watchmaker aged 47 years. o:Height 65 in, Weight 106 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered ESR.
